title: Regulation (EEC) No 1556/74 of the Council of 18 June 1974 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1411/71 as regards the fat content of whole milk
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1556/74 OF THE COUNCIL  of 18 June 1974  amending Regulation (EEC) No 1411/71 as regards the fat content of whole milk
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 6 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1411/71 shall be amended as follows:    1. the date "31 December 1973" shall be replaced by "31 December 1975";
2. the second paragraph shall be deleted.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 18 June 1974.
For the Council
The President
J. ERTL  (1)OJ No L 148, 3.7.1971, p. 4. (2)OJ No L 357, 28.12.1973, p. 7. (3)OJ No L 73, 27.3.1972, p. 14.
